content: Thank you for providing me with the ISBN-10 and ISBN-13 of the book. The book with these ISBNs is titled "God's Psychiatry" and is written by Dr. Charles L. Allen. It was first published in 1953 and has since been republished several times. The book focuses on the practical application of Christian principles to everyday life, and how one can find peace, happiness, and fulfillment by following God's guidance. It has been a popular book among Christians for many years, and is often cited as a helpful resource for those seeking to deepen their faith and improve their mental and emotional well-being.
